name: css-image-orientation
description: Css module of single purpose classes for image orientation

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-image-orientation.css > css/css-image-orientation.css && tachyons src/css-image-orientation.css --minify > css/css-image-orientation.min.css && tachyons src/css-image-orientation.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
